products.name: React Fiber Shell
products.description: A technical soft-shell jacket engineered for late-night shipping parties and dawn patrol keynotes. Lightweight stretch weave with a quilted yoke subtly echoing the Fiber architecture.
features: 3-layer breathable membrane with DWR treatment
Laser-cut cuff detailing featuring the React atom lattice
Packable hood with magnetic stow strap
highlights: 10% of proceeds fund the React Maintainer Fellowship
Produced in limited batches of 300 with carbon-neutral logistics

images.alt: React Fiber Shell jacket on a ghost mannequin under cinematic lighting
React Fiber Shell folded with accessories on a carbon fiber table
Macro detail of the React Fiber Shell cuff with cyan piping
React Fiber Shell jacket draped over a chair highlighting articulated seams
Back view of the React Fiber Shell with hood under soft spotlight

products.name: React Debate Club Mug
products.tagline: "I don't hate React. I just love arguing online."
products.description: Matte obsidian ceramic mug from the Winter launch featuring the React atom and the tongue-in-cheek motto for lively architecture debates.
features: Double-wall ceramic keeps debate-fueled espresso at temperature
Engraved React atom emblem with luminous cyan enamel fill
Quote wrap reads "I don't hate React. I just love arguing online."
highlights: Portion of proceeds funds OSS moderation tooling
Includes downloadable wallpaper set with the quote

images.alt: React Debate Club Mug on a dark walnut desk with cyan logo
React Debate Club Mug on obsidian stone with teal accent light
Lifestyle desk scene with React Debate Club Mug next to keyboard
React Debate Club Mug steaming on a winter rooftop terrace
Macro detail of the React Debate Club Mug quote in cyan lighting

products.name: React Archive Tee 01
products.description: Matte black heavyweight tee with a gradient React atom rendered in luminous inks that glow softly under stage lights.
features: 6.5 oz ringspun cotton with garment-dyed finish
Reinforced shoulder seams for conference tote hauling
Glow-reactive print cures for 150+ wash cycles
highlights: Styled in collaboration with the React Conf design crew
Every tee funds one hour of mentorship for emerging OSS contributors

images.alt: React Archive Tee 01 hanging with neon gradient React atom
React Archive Tee 01 folded beside headphones and conference badge
Close-up of the React Archive Tee 01 neon gradient chest graphic
Back view of React Archive Tee 01 laid flat showing clean seams
React Archive Tee 01 styled on mannequin torso with conference badge

products.name: React Archive Tee 02
products.description: Electric cobalt tee with a minimalist white line rendering of the React atom, celebrating timeless interface architecture.
features: Mid-weight jersey with brushed interior handfeel
Side-stitched seams to hold shape session after session
Discharge printed graphic for zero hand feel
highlights: Includes a numbered authenticity card signed by maintainers

specs.label: Care
specs.value: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

images.alt: React Archive Tee 02 cobalt tee on mannequin with white monoline logo
React Archive Tee 02 folded on marble workspace with notebook

React Archive Tee 02 draped over chair with cyan accent lighting
Stack of React Archive Tee 02 garments with hang tags on display

products.name: React Archive Tee 03
products.description: Soft cream tee featuring a vintage collegiate crest celebrating the first React commit and the open-source stewards who keep shipping.
features: Combed organic cotton with enzyme wash for softness
Heritage crest printed with water-based inks
Interior story label referencing the RFC that launched Hooks
highlights: Includes archival postcard set from the React core team
5% donated to the React Education Grant for community workshops

images.alt: React Archive Tee 03 cream tee on hanger with heritage crest
React Archive Tee 03 flat lay with archival postcards
Close-up of React Archive Tee 03 crest embroidery and fabric texture
React Archive Tee 03 displayed on mannequin with rolled sleeves
Stack of React Archive Tee 03 tied with twine and authenticity card

products.name: React Archive Tee 04
products.description: Charcoal athletic tee with cascading cyan micro React atoms celebrating the choreography of concurrent rendering.
features: Moisture-wicking performance knit for hackathon marathons
Flatlock seams to prevent distraction during pairing sessions
Reflective micro atoms for late-night city ride visibility
highlights: Every tee funds field research for the React Accessibility Initiative
Includes beta access to the Foundation’s design token playground

images.alt: React Archive Tee 04 athletic charcoal tee on display stand with cascading atoms

Close-up of React Archive Tee 04 reflective micro atoms under cyan light

products.name: Maintainer Residency Hoodie
products.description: Brushed fleece hoodie with embroidered atom crest released during the 2024 Maintainer Residency cohort.
features: Midweight fleece milled in North Carolina
Kangaroo pocket with hidden zipper stash
Tonal embroidered React atom crest
highlights: Helped fund the Maintainer Residency housing stipend
Paired with an exclusive wallpaper pack for supporters

specs.label: Care
specs.value: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

products.name: Foundation Espresso Tumbler
products.description: Double-walled ceramic tumbler with silicone lid released alongside the 2023 Reactathon.
features: Holds 8 oz with double-wall insulation
Gloss glaze with etched Foundation wordmark
Includes silicone travel lid with tight seal
highlights: First run funded the React Documentation translation drive
Members requested a future restock—waitlist now open
